Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurs in cases that eventually lead to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are followed by Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR compared to the frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are immediately followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events that occur in cases with total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that appear in variants ending with Payment Handled versus those ending with any rejection activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR is missing despite the presence of Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION or Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: the average of the function base == 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are preceded by Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION but not by Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in variants that include at least one rejection step versus variants with no rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that occur in cases ultimately rejected by any actor, especially Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events per case in variants that loop due to prior rejections
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that are directly followed by a rejection from any role, with specific tracking of paths leading to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurrences per year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
